sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import { getOrientationLabel, getShadingLabel, getUtilisationLabel } from './roofLabelUtils'; const RoofSelectionList = ({ addedRoofs, onRoofsUpdate }) => { if (addedRoofs.length === 0) return null; const handleRoofSelectionChange = (roofId, selected) => { const updatedRoofs = addedRoofs.map(roof => roof.id === roofId ? { ...roof, selected } : roof ); onRoofsUpdate(updatedRoofs); }; const selectedRoofs = addedRoofs.filter(roof => roof.selected); const totalSelectedPotential = selectedRoofs.reduce((sum, roof) => sum + roof.solarPotential, 0); return (

🏠 Select Roofs for Solar Installation

Choose which roofs you want to install solar panels on. You can select multiple roofs or change your selection anytime.

{addedRoofs.map((roof) => (
Roof {roof.id}
{roof.solarPotential.toFixed(2)} Solar Potential
Area: {roof.area.toFixed(2)} m²
Orientation: {getOrientationLabel(roof.orientation)}
Angle: {roof.angle}°
Shading: {getShadingLabel(roof.shading)}
Utilisation: {getUtilisationLabel(roof.utilisation)}
))}
{/* Selection Summary */}
{selectedRoofs.length} Selected Roofs
{totalSelectedPotential.toFixed(2)} Total Solar Potential
{selectedRoofs.reduce((sum, roof) => sum + roof.area, 0).toFixed(2)} m² Total Roof Area
); }; export default RoofSelectionList;
